result.reason: Upgrading to v1.77.1 clears stored default credentials, causing data loss for users on upgrade — likely a migration or deserialization regression in the credentials/config loading path.
result.approach: Identify what changed in the default credentials storage/loading between v1.76 and v1.77.1 (key rename, schema change, or missing migration step) and add a migration that reads the old format and populates the new one on first launch after upgrade.
